altername_name: Jet Set Willy: Willy's New Hat
name: Willy's New Hat
overview: An early 'remake' of Jet Set Willy - the game continues Miner Willy's adventures in all new environments with a strangely strobing hat sprite... while this game would be quickly outstripped in terms of what would be possible for Jet Set Willy hacks, it remains an important early example of the sub-genre. The unknown offer doubled-down on their rip-offs too, the opening music being taken from Knight Lore.
